name: fa-lang
description: Fa is a programming language which is intended to be as fast as low-level languages like C++ and Rust and as easy to use as high-level languages like Python and Javascript.

scripts.dev: bun run main && chokidar 'source/**/*.nim' -c 'bun run main'
scripts.dev:js: bun run main:js && chokidar 'source/**/*.nim' -c 'bun run main:js'
scripts.calculator:dev: bun run calculator && chokidar 'sandbox/calculator/**/*.nim' -c 'bun run calculator'
scripts.json-parser:dev: bun run json-parser && chokidar 'sandbox/json-parser/**/*.nim' -c 'bun run json-parser'

author: lepzulnag
